verses.verse: It <S%H1732>happened,<s%> when David <S%H3427>lived<s%> in his <S%H1004>house,<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H3427>"Behold,<s%> I dwell in a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H730>cedar,<s%> but the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is under <S%H3407>curtains.<s%>"
<S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H6213>"Do<s%> all that is in your <S%H3824>heart;<s%> for God is with <S%H430>you.<s%>"
It happened the same <S%H3915>night,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> came to <S%H5416>Nathan,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3212>"Go<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H559><s%> 'Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "You shall not <S%H1129>build<s%> me a <S%H1004>house<s%> to dwell <S%H3427>in;<s%>

for I have not lived <S%H3427>in<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> since the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I brought <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to this <S%H3117>day,<s%> but have gone from <S%H168>tent<s%> to <S%H168>tent,<s%> and from one tent to <S%H4908>another.<s%>

In all places in which I have <S%H1980>walked<s%> with all <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> did I <S%H1696>speak<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> with <S%H259>any<s%> of the <S%H8199>judges<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> whom I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to be <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> of my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1129><s%> 'Why have you not built me a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H730>cedar?<s%>'"'

"Now <S%H559>therefore,<s%> you shall tell my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H559><s%> 'Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> "I <S%H3947>took<s%> you from the sheep <S%H5116>pen,<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> that you should be <S%H5057>prince<s%> over my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

I have been with you wherever you have <S%H1980>gone,<s%> and have cut <S%H3772>off<s%> all your <S%H341>enemies<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6213>you.<s%> I will make you a <S%H8034>name,<s%> like the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the great <S%H1419>ones<s%> who are in the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

I will <S%H7760>appoint<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> for my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and will <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H7931>them,<s%> that they may dwell in their own <S%H7264>place,<s%> and be moved no <S%H1121>more;<s%> neither shall the children of <S%H5766>wickedness<s%> <S%H1086>waste<s%> them any <S%H3254>more,<s%> as at the <S%H7223>first,<s%>

and from the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H8199>judges<s%> to be over my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and I will <S%H3665>subdue<s%> all your <S%H341>enemies.<s%> Moreover I <S%H5046>tell<s%> you that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H1129>build<s%> you a <S%H1004>house.<s%>

It shall <S%H3117>happen,<s%> when your days are <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> that you must <S%H3212>go<s%> to be with your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> that I will set <S%H6965>up<s%> your <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1121>you,<s%> who shall be of your sons; and I will <S%H3559>establish<s%> his <S%H4438>kingdom.<s%>
He shall <S%H1129>build<s%> me a <S%H1004>house,<s%> and I will <S%H3559>establish<s%> his <S%H3678%H99999>throne<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

I will be his <S%H1>father,<s%> and he shall be my <S%H1121>son.<s%> I will not <S%H5493>take<s%> my loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> from <S%H5493>him,<s%> as I took it from him that was before <S%H6440>you;<s%>

but I will <S%H5975>settle<s%> him in my <S%H1004>house<s%> and in my <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%> His <S%H3678>throne<s%> shall be <S%H3559%H99999>established<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>"'"
According to all these <S%H1697>words,<s%> and according to all this <S%H2377>vision,<s%> so <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H1732>David.<s%>

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H3427>in,<s%> and sat <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Who am <S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh <S%H430>God,<s%> and what is my <S%H1004>house,<s%> that you have <S%H935>brought<s%> me thus <S%H1988>far?<s%>

This was a small <S%H6994>thing<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H430>God;<s%> but you have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> for a great while to <S%H7350>come,<s%> and have <S%H7200>respected<s%> me according to the <S%H8448>estate<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> of high <S%H4609>degree,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

What <S%H3254>can<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> say yet <S%H3254>more<s%> to you concerning the <S%H3519>honor<s%> which is done to your <S%H5650>servant?<s%> For you <S%H3045>know<s%> your <S%H5650>servant.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> for your <S%H5650>servant<s%>'s <S%H3820>sake,<s%> and according to your own heart, you have <S%H6213>worked<s%> all this <S%H1420>greatness,<s%> to make <S%H3045>known<s%> all these great <S%H1420>things.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> there is none like <S%H430>you,<s%> neither is there any God <S%H2108>besides<s%> <S%H8085>you,<s%> according to all that we have heard with our <S%H241>ears.<s%>

What <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%> is like your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> whom <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H6299>redeem<s%> to himself for a <S%H5971>people,<s%> to <S%H7760>make<s%> you a <S%H8034>name<s%> by <S%H1420>great<s%> and <S%H3372>awesome<s%> <S%H1644>things,<s%> in driving out <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H5971>people,<s%> whom you <S%H6299>redeem<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt?<s%>
For your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> you <S%H5414>made<s%> your own <S%H5971%H99999>people<s%> <S%H5769>forever;<s%> and <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh, became their <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H3068>Now,<s%> Yahweh, let the <S%H1697>word<s%> that you have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> concerning your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and concerning his <S%H1004>house,<s%> be <S%H539%H99999>established<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> as you have <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

Let your <S%H8034>name<s%> be <S%H539>established<s%> and <S%H1431%H99999>magnified<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3068><s%> 'Yahweh of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> is the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> even a <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> The <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> is <S%H3559>established<s%> before <S%H6440>you.<s%>'

For <S%H430>you,<s%> my God, have <S%H1540>revealed<s%> to your <S%H5650>servant<s%> that you will <S%H1129>build<s%> him a <S%H1004>house.<s%> Therefore your <S%H5650>servant<s%> has <S%H4672>found<s%> courage to <S%H6419>pray<s%> before <S%H6440>you.<s%>
<S%H3068>Now,<s%> Yahweh, you are <S%H430>God,<s%> and have <S%H1696>promised<s%> this <S%H2896>good<s%> thing to your <S%H5650>servant.<s%>

Now it has <S%H2974>pleased<s%> you to <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> that it may continue <S%H5769>forever<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>you;<s%> for you, Yahweh, have <S%H1288>blessed,<s%> and it is <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>"
